title: Dark Phantom (Phantom Diaries Beginnings, #2)
description: Left at the Paris Opera House as a baby, the young Eric’s teen years are fraught with despair and discovery as he discovers his love for music and surviving the streets of Paris. Phantom Diaries Beginnings - about the origins of Eric from The Phantom Diaries’ young adult paranormal retelling of The Phantom of the Opera.
author: Kailin Gow
